R0_AgeEntry.x-description: Using the best DOB, ADOB in the General table in Mailing, and when the questionnaire was received, values of 6 in the Events table, to create Age at Entry.

R0_DOB.x-description: Taken from the fields ADOB in the General SQL table in the Mailing database.

R0_YOB.x-description: The year of teh DOB before it is shifted for pseudo-anonymization.

R0_EntryDate.description: Shifted date of entry into the study.
R0_EntryDate.x-description: Shifted date of questionnaire completion, or if no date of completion, the date the questionnaire was received.

R0_Ethnicity.x-description: White includes: White, Jewish Ashkenazi, Jewish Sephardi. Black includes: Caribbean, African, Black-other. Asian includes: Indian, Pakistani, Bangladeshi, Chinese. Those reporting other or multiple ethnicities are grouped together.

R0_AshkenaziAncestry.description: Flag for whether the participant has Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.
R0_AshkenaziAncestry.x-description: Binary field indicating Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.

R0_Height20.x-description: Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to cm (ft*30.48 + in*2.54) 2) Direct metric input. If both sources exist and differ by >5cm, uses value in [145-185]cm range. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_Weight20.description: Weight in kilograms. Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to kg (st*6.350293 + lbs*0.45359237) 2) Direct metric input. Uses imperial conversion when both sources exist. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_BMI20.description: BMI at 20 years old. Set to null if participant was not yet 20 at the the time of study entry or if participant was pregnant at 20 years old.
R0_BMI20.x-description: Body Mass Index (kg/m²). Age null calculation done by reading in age at entry to study. Pregnancy null calculation done by deriving end date of pregnancy, subtracting the length of pregnancy, and based on DOB, working out if thepregnancy range falls while the participant was 20.

R0_Height.x-description: Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to cm (ft*30.48 + in*2.54) 2) Direct metric input. If both sources exist and differ by >5cm, uses value in [145-185]cm range. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_Weight.description: Weight in kilograms. Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to kg (st*6.350293 + lbs*0.45359237) 2) Direct metric input. Uses imperial conversion when both sources exist. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_BMI.description: BMI at time of filling out survey. Set to null if participant is pregnant at entry.
R0_BMI.x-description: Body Mass Index (kg/m²). If currently pregnant is true when filling out the questionnaire, BMI is not calculated.

R0_WaistCircum.x-description: Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to cm (in*2.54) 2) Direct metric input. Uses imperial conversion when both sources exist. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_HipCircum.x-description: Derived using priority: 1) Imperial inputs converted to kg (in*2.54) 2) Direct metric input. Uses imperial conversion when both sources exist. If neither valid, defaults to 99999 (unknown).

R0_WaistHipRatio.description: Waist-to-hip ratio at study entry. Set to null if participant is pregnant at entry.
R0_WaistHipRatio.x-description: Waist-to-hip ratio. If currently pregnant is true when filling out the questionnaire, WHR is not calculated.

R0_AgeMenarche.description: How old was the participant when they began having regular cycles?

R0_OralContraceptiveStatus.description: Whether the participant was using oral contraceptives at entry to the study.
R0_OralContraceptiveStatus.x-description: Combines whether the participant has ever used oral contraceptives, what ages they started and stopped using it, and entry date to calculate if they were using it at entry to the study.

R0_AgeStartedOC.x-description: Can get direct from youngest age in questionnaire questions, or from OC episode array: pick earliest start date across episodes; age = floor(start_date - DOB). If only age-at-start asked, carry through.

R0_AgeLastUsedOC.x-description: Can get direct from oldest age in questionnaire questions, or from OC episodes: take latest stop date (or EntryDate if ongoing). Age = floor(stop_date - DOB).

R0_OCLength.description: Total duration of oral contraceptive use (years).
R0_OCLength.x-description: Sum over OC episodes: (stop i start) in days / 365.25. For ongoing use at R0, use EntryDate as stop. Merge overlapping episodes before summing; ignore negative/implausible spans.

R0_Parous.x-description: From Pregnancies array: 1 if any episode indicates a live birth; 0 if none.

R0_Parity.x-description: Count pregnancies with outcome=live birth. Exclude stillbirths/miscarriages/terminations.

R0_AgeBirthFirst.x-description: Age - earliest live-birth pregnancy end date.

R0_AgeBirthLast.x-description: As for first birth, but use latest live-birth episode.

R0_BreastfeedingDuration.description: Total months of breastfeeding across all children.
R0_BreastfeedingDuration.x-description: Sum reported breastfeeding duration per live-birth episode (months). If reported as weeks, convert (÷4.345). If not all lengths of breastfeeding given for all pregnancies, use the average length of breastfeeding to fill in missing.

R0_Breastfed.description: Whether the participant has ever breastfed.
R0_Breastfed.x-description: If the participant indicated that they breastfed any of their children.

R0_BBD.x-description: From BreastDisease section: 1 if any benign condition reported/biopsy noted; else 0. Cross-check with free-text when coded ‘other’.

R0_FamHistBC.description: Family history of breast cancer in first-degree relatives flag. Self reported.
R0_FamHistBC.x-description: Set 1 first degree family reported breast cancer; else 0. Ignore second-degree relatives for this flag.

R0_DiabetesStatus.x-description: Questionnaire self-report of doctor diagnosis prior to R0.

R0_AgeDiabetes.x-description: Taken directly from questionnaire variable, otherwise unknown.

R0_DiabetesInsulin.description: Whether diabetes was treated with insulin at baseline.
R0_DiabetesInsulin.x-description: Taken directly from questionnaire variable, otherwise unknown.

R0_AgeMenopause.x-description: Uses questionnaire variable as best answer, or if no answer avalable, variable takes into account reported operations, cancer treatments, HRT and OC use. Assumed age 51 years when menopause is masked by hysterectomy or HRT use.

R0_MenopauseReason.x-description: Uses quesionnaire variable. If no other informatoin given then answer unknown.
enumDescriptions: 5: Chemotherapy, radiotherapy, or oher cancer treatment.
6: Does not know reason for stopping.
13: Natural menopause while on HRT or OC.
18: Surgery, but not oophorectomy or hysterectomy.

R0_HRTStatus.description: Menopausal hormone treatment status at baseline.
R0_HRTStatus.x-description: From HRT episode array: any prior but stopped = Former; active at R0 (stop missing or after EntryDate) = Current; none = Never.

R0_HRTStartAge.x-description: Earliest HRT start across episodes as given in the questionnaire.

R0_HRTStopAge.x-description: Latest HRT stop across episodes as given in the questionnaire.

R0_HRTDuration.description: Total duration of menopausal hormone treatment (years).
R0_HRTDuration.x-description: Sum merged HRT episodes (stop - start)/365.25. If overlapping, does not duplicate overlapping time. Only includes periods before recruitment, not estimating open ended times occuring during entry date.

R0_AlcoholStatus.x-description: Using questionnaire variables if ever been a regular drinker, and if still drinking at least one glass per week.

R0_AgeStartedDrinking.x-description: Using questionnaire variable at what age did you start drinking.

R0_AgeStoppedDrinking.x-description: Using questionnaire variable at what age did you stop drinking.

R0_AlcoholUnitsPerWeek.description: Weekly alcohol units among current drinkers.
R0_AlcoholUnitsPerWeek.x-description: Average of weekly units of all alcohols asked about in age range during entry to study.

R0_SmokingStatus.x-description: Using questionnaire variables if ever been a regular smoker, and if still smoking regularly.

R0_AgeStartedSmoking.x-description: Using questionnaire variable at what age did you start smoking regularly.

R0_AgeStoppedSmoking.x-description: Using questionnaire variable at what age did you stop smoking regularly.

R0_CigsPerDay.x-description: Average of cigarettes per day smoked in age range during entry to study.

R0_PackYears.x-description: Compute (cigarettes per day/20)*years smoked across smoking episodes; years = (stop - start)/365.25. Merge overlapping episodes; ignore implausible spans.

R0_PhysicalActivity.x-description: Multiply reported hours/week in each activity domain by standard MET values; sum across domains in age range during entry to study.

R0_AgeFupStart.description: Age at start of follow-up for cancer analyses.

R0_AgeFupStop.description: Age at end of follow-up for cancer analyses.

enumDescriptions: 10: (Full) Follow-up known by completion of latest due to questionnaire.
20: (Full) Follow-up known by Flagging linkage to national cancer and death registries.
21: (Partial) Follow-up by Flagging linkages to end of Flagging Coverage Date.
22: (Full) Follow-up known by Flagging date of death.
23: (Full) Follow-up known by flagging to exit/embarkation date from Flagging system.

R0_DateFupStart.description: Shifted date of start of follow-up for cancer analyses.

R0_DateFupStop.description: Shifted date of end of follow-up for cancer analyses.

R0_AgeCensoring.description: Censoring age for cancer cohort analyses.
